long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Light Worm for Chrome Extension is a captivating and free casual puzzle game that you can play on the website https://googlesnake.org/.

In this game, you are presented with a unique twist on the classic snake concept. Your goal is to guide the worm to the food by clicking or tapping at the right time. Unlike traditional snake games where you move in straight lines that turn at 90-degree angles, "Light Worm" introduces a circular movement mechanic. On each move, you rotate between clockwise and counterclockwise directions, creating a challenging and dynamic gameplay experience.

Your task is to navigate the worm through various obstacles and mazes, timing your clicks or taps perfectly to ensure the worm reaches its destination. It requires precision and strategic thinking to avoid collisions and successfully guide the worm to the food.

"Light Worm" offers a casual and engaging puzzle-solving experience suitable for players of all ages. The game tests your reflexes, coordination, and ability to make quick decisions. As you progress through the levels, the challenges become more complex and require even more precise timing.

To play "Light Worm" for Chrome Extension, simply visit the website https://googlesnake.org/ using your web browser. Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing gameplay, click or tap at the right time to control the worm's circular movements, and overcome the obstacles to reach the food.


Note: If you want play more games please click on "More Games" or you can find on our website is: https://googlesnake.org/ Thanks!
